question: What is the name of the online portal recently launched to provide information about the stage of trials of the drugs of CSIR?
explanation:
Union Science and Technology Minister Harsh Vardhan has recently launched an online portal named ‘CuRED’.
The portal provides information about CSIR backed repurposed drugs and their present stage of trials. The portal also provides details about clinical trials of diagnostics and devices in which CSIR is involved.
